alert.note: Alert for Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 12:19AM CDT until June 29 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN TREMPEALEAU COUNTY... At 1218 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Strum, or 9 miles north of Whitehall, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. Very frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Osseo around 1225 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Borst Valley Area, Eleva, Pleasantville, Chimney Rock, Highway 53 And County E, Elk Creek and Pigeon Falls. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 88 and 91. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
